snippet: Wade scored 27 points, Goran Dragic added 25 against his former club and the Heat defeated the Phoenix Suns, 108-92, in Miami to extend their winning streak to three games.
abstract: Miami Heat defeats Phoenix Suns, 108-92; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Wade scored 27 points, Goran Dragic added 25 against his former club and the Heat defeated the Phoenix Suns, 108-92, in Miami to extend their winning streak to three games.

headline.main: Dwyane Wade Helps Heat Win Third Straight
headline.print_headline: Wade Helps Heat Win Third Straight
